record.utterances: [{"timestamp": "00:00:02", "speaker": "agent", "text": "TechStore support, David speaking. How can I help you today?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:07", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Hi David, I'd like to return a pair of headphones. They're just not comfortable for me."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:14", "speaker": "agent", "text": "I'm sorry the headphones didn't work out for you. I can definitely help with that. Do you have your order number handy?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:21", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Yes, it's ORD-2025-87654."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:27", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Thank you. Let me pull that up."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:32", "speaker": "system", "text": "[Brief typing pause]"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:40", "speaker": "agent", "text": "I see you purchased the Noise-Canceling Headset about 12 days ago. Is the product in its original condition with all the packaging?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:50", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Yes, I only used them a few times. Everything is there - the case, cables, all of it."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:58", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Perfect, that's well within our 30-day return window. Just to make sure I understand - they're physically working fine, just not comfortable for you?"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:08", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Right. The sound quality is great, but they press too hard on my ears. After about an hour, it starts to hurt."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:17", "speaker": "agent", "text": "I understand completely. Comfort is really personal when it comes to headphones. I can process a return for you, or if you're interested, I could suggest an alternative model that might be more comfortable?"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:30", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Actually, yes, I'd be interested in hearing about alternatives. I really did like the noise cancellation."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:38", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Great! We have the EarPods Pro that have the same excellent noise cancellation, but they're earbuds instead of over-ear, so no pressure on the ears at all. Or there's the ComfortMax Headphones which have extra cushioning and a looser fit."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:55", "speaker": "customer", "text": "The EarPods Pro sound interesting. Are they similar in price?"}, {"timestamp": "00:02:00", "speaker": "agent", "text": "They're actually $30 less than what you paid for the Noise-Canceling Headset, so you'd get that difference refunded back to you."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:10", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Oh nice! Yeah, let's do an exchange for those then."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:15", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Perfect choice! Let me set that up for you. I'll email you a prepaid return label for the headset. Once we receive it, we'll ship out the EarPods Pro and refund the $30 difference to your original payment method."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:30", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Sounds great. How long will all that take?"}, {"timestamp": "00:02:34", "speaker": "agent", "text": "You'll receive the return label within an hour. Once we receive the return - usually takes 3-5 days after you ship it - we'll process everything within 24 hours. So you should have your new EarPods Pro within about 10 days total."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:50", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Perfect. Thank you so much for the help and the recommendation!"}, {"timestamp": "00:02:55", "speaker": "agent", "text": "My pleasure! I hope the EarPods Pro work out better for you. Is there anything else I can help with today?"}, {"timestamp": "00:03:02", "speaker": "customer", "text": "No, that's everything. Thanks David!"}, {"timestamp": "00:03:05", "speaker": "agent", "text": "You're welcome! Have a great day!"}]
record.action_items: ["Process exchange", "Send return label", "Ship EarPods Pro", "Refund difference"]

errors.msg: No matching support_ticket record for ticket_id=TKT-000011

record.utterances: [{"timestamp": "00:00:02", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Hello, may I speak with Mr. or Ms. Thompson?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:07", "speaker": "customer", "text": "This is Ms. Thompson."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:10", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Hi Ms. Thompson, this is Maria from TechStore Customer Resolutions. I'm calling regarding the email you sent us about the UltraSound Earbuds. Do you have a few minutes to discuss?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:23", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Oh, yes. I was pretty upset about that."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:27", "speaker": "agent", "text": "I completely understand, and I want to sincerely apologize. I've reviewed your case thoroughly and I can see why you were frustrated."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:36", "speaker": "customer", "text": "The website said 24-hour battery life! I'm getting maybe 4 hours."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:42", "speaker": "agent", "text": "You're absolutely right to be concerned. I looked into this, and I need to be transparent with you. The '24-hour battery life' actually refers to the total usage when you include the charging case - that's 6 hours from the earbuds themselves, plus 18 hours from the case."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:02", "speaker": "customer", "text": "That's... pretty misleading."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:05", "speaker": "agent", "text": "I agree, and I've already flagged this with our marketing team. We should make that much clearer on the product page. But here's the other thing - you mentioned you're only getting 4 hours per charge, not 6?"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:20", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Right. Maybe 4 hours on a good day."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:24", "speaker": "agent", "text": "That's below spec even for the earbuds alone, which tells me you may have received a defective unit. That's not acceptable either."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:34", "speaker": "customer", "text": "So what are you going to do about it?"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:37", "speaker": "agent", "text": "I'd like to offer you a few options. First, I can send you a replacement pair that should give you the proper 6-hour battery life from the earbuds. Second, if you'd prefer, I can process a full refund."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:52", "speaker": "customer", "text": "What's the third option?"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:55", "speaker": "agent", "text": "The third option is that I send you our upgraded model, the UltraSound Pro, which has true 8-hour battery life in the earbuds alone - no misleading advertising, I promise. Normally it's $50 more, but I can send it to you at no additional cost as an apology for this experience."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:15", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Hmm... and what about compensation for my trouble?"}, {"timestamp": "00:02:20", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Whichever option you choose, I'm also adding a $25 store credit to your account. I know it doesn't make up for the frustration, but I hope it shows we take this seriously."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:33", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Okay... I appreciate that. Let me think..."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:40", "speaker": "system", "text": "[Brief pause]"}, {"timestamp": "00:02:48", "speaker": "customer", "text": "I'll take the replacement. The regular ones, not the upgrade. The sound quality was actually good, I just need them to last longer."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:58", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Absolutely, I understand. I'll ship out a new pair today with express delivery. You should have them within 2 days."}, {"timestamp": "00:03:08", "speaker": "customer", "text": "And I don't need to return the defective ones?"}, {"timestamp": "00:03:12", "speaker": "agent", "text": "You can if you'd like to, but it's not required. You can keep them, recycle them, or donate them - whatever you prefer."}, {"timestamp": "00:03:22", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Okay. Thank you, Maria. I appreciate you calling me back about this."}, {"timestamp": "00:03:28", "speaker": "agent", "text": "It's my pleasure. We really do value you as a customer, and I'm sorry this product didn't meet your expectations. Is there anything else I can help you with?"}, {"timestamp": "00:03:38", "speaker": "customer", "text": "No, I think we're good. Thanks again."}, {"timestamp": "00:03:41", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Thank you for your patience, Ms. Thompson. Have a wonderful day!"}]
record.action_items: ["Ship replacement earbuds", "Add $25 store credit", "Flag marketing for website update"]

record.utterances: [{"timestamp": "00:00:02", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Thank you for calling TechStore, my name is Sarah. How can I help you?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:07", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Hi, I'm not a customer yet, but I had some questions before making a purchase."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:13", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Of course! I'd be happy to answer any questions. What would you like to know?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:18", "speaker": "customer", "text": "I'm looking at your standing desks on the website. Do they require assembly?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:24", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Great question! Our standing desks do require some assembly. The PremiumDesk Pro takes about 45 minutes to an hour and comes with all the tools needed. We also offer professional assembly for $79 if you'd prefer that."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:40", "speaker": "customer", "text": "And what's your return policy on furniture?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:44", "speaker": "agent", "text": "For furniture items, we have a 30-day return policy. If you're not satisfied for any reason, we'll arrange a pickup and provide a full refund. The item just needs to be in good condition."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:57", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Even if it's assembled?"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:00", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Yes, even if it's assembled. We understand you need to actually use it to know if it works for you."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:08", "speaker": "customer", "text": "That's reassuring. One more question - do you price match?"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:13", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Yes, we do! If you find the exact same product at a lower price from an authorized retailer, we'll match that price. Just share the link at checkout or contact us after purchase."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:26", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Perfect. I think I'm ready to order. Thank you for the information!"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:31", "speaker": "agent", "text": "You're welcome! Would you like me to stay on the line while you place the order in case you have any questions?"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:38", "speaker": "customer", "text": "No, I think I'm good. Thanks though!"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:41", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Sounds good! If you need any help, don't hesitate to call back. Have a great day!"}]

record.utterances: [{"timestamp": "00:00:02", "speaker": "agent", "text": "TechStore support, this is David. How may I assist you?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:07", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Hi, I need to return a product. It's not what I expected."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:12", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Of course, I can help with that. May I have your order number?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:17", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Sure, it's ORD-2025-82567."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:23", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Thank you. Let me look that up for you."}, {"timestamp": "00:00:30", "speaker": "system", "text": "[Brief pause - 15 seconds]"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:48", "speaker": "agent", "text": "I see you ordered the Ultra Travel Guide on March 15th. May I ask what wasn't as expected?"}, {"timestamp": "00:00:57", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Well, the book arrived in German. But I definitely ordered the English version."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:04", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Oh no, I apologize for that. Let me check your order details... You're absolutely right, your order shows the English edition but it looks like we shipped the German one by mistake."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:18", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Yeah, I thought so. I mean, my German isn't great, so..."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:24", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Ha! I understand completely. Here's what I'm going to do - I'll send you the correct English version right away at no additional cost. And you know what? You don't even need to return the German one."}, {"timestamp": "00:01:38", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Wait, really? I can keep it?"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:41", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Absolutely. It was our mistake, and the cost of return shipping wouldn't make sense for a book. Consider it a gift - maybe you'll be inspired to brush up on your German!"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:53", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Ha! That's very generous. Thank you so much!"}, {"timestamp": "00:01:57", "speaker": "agent", "text": "You're welcome! The English version should arrive within 3-4 business days. Is the shipping address still 456 Oak Lane?"}, {"timestamp": "00:02:07", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Yes, that's correct."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:10", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Perfect. You'll receive a shipping confirmation email shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with?"}, {"timestamp": "00:02:17", "speaker": "customer", "text": "No, that's everything. You've been really helpful, David."}, {"timestamp": "00:02:21", "speaker": "agent", "text": "My pleasure! I hope you enjoy the book - I hear the travel guide is excellent. Have a great trip!"}, {"timestamp": "00:02:28", "speaker": "customer", "text": "Thanks! Bye!"}, {"timestamp": "00:02:30", "speaker": "agent", "text": "Goodbye!"}]
